com.viaoa.jsp
Class OACombo

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.jsp.OACombo
All Implemented Interfaces:
OAJspComponent, OATableEditor, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
OAList
public class OACombo
extends java.lang.Object
implements OAJspComponent, OATableEditor

Controls html select+options bind to hub, property set column width show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change handle required validation recursive, displayed using indentation option to set the null description

Author:
vvia
See Also:
Serialized Form
